title: Stuck on "Reconnect" Screen after finishing a game
body: I finished a game, and tried to start a new one. It said I was already in a game so I restarted the client. When i logged on again I was stuck on "reconnect" screen, saying that I left a game, which did not exist anymore. I tried "reconnecting" but it only led me to a black screen, and nothing happens. Please help me fix this, it has been 2 hours. Thanks!

replies.body: It sounds like you experienced a ghost game issue, meaning that our server was failing to communicate the end of the match.  If you're still experiencing this, restarting your pc can also help resolve this to force an update.  Otherwise, after a period of time it should resolve itself.  Hopefully, everything is good to go now!
